headline: Verisk Analytics (VRSK): Assessing Valuation After Lowered 2025 Revenue Guidance and Growth Concerns
summary: Verisk Analytics (VRSK) recently issued new full-year guidance and lowered its revenue expectations for 2025. This update comes amid rising concerns about slowing revenue growth and potential challenges related to the company’s latest acquisition. See our latest analysis for Verisk Analytics. Shares of Verisk Analytics have come under pressure, dropping 19.1% over the last quarter as the market digests softer revenue growth guidance, potential integration risks from a major acquisition, and a...
